title: Revolt
description: Reign Harrow was the princess of rock until she randomly disappeared six months ago. Taking her secrets and her fame with her. Now she's back, and she seems more determined than ever to be the best. To earn the awards and the titles others only dream of…and maybe even a little revenge along the way. To show everyone that wronged her just what she is made of. But when her past collides with dreams, can Reign withstand the heat once more? Will she reach her crescendo or will it be curtain fall? Tune in for tonight’s show and find out. Long may she Reign!
author: K.A. Knight
